attributes.action: put the top generals in charge of all loghistics
attributes.background: to put the military in charge of all logistics and deliveries they are the best of the best we need cool heads and top brains on this virus now to make sure ppe and all other logistics get to where they need to be at any givenm time

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

The armed forces have already been helping with the Government's response to coronavirus, including the logistics for distributing PPE. We're therefore not exactly sure what further action you'd like to see. 

You can find out more here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/government-sets-out-plan-for-national-effort-on-ppe
